member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonException
member.summary: The exception thrown when an error occurs during JSON serialization or deserialization.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or null if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializationException
member.summary: The exception thrown when an error occurs during JSON serialization or deserialization.

member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or null if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings
member.summary: Specifies the settings on a object.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings.NullValueHandling
member.summary: Gets or sets how null values are handled during serialization and deserialization.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings.TypeNameHandling
member.summary: Gets or sets how type name writing and reading is handled by the serializer.
member.remarks: should be used with caution when your application deserializes JSON from an external source. Incoming types should be validated with a custom SerializationBinder /> when deserializing with a value other than .

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings.ContractResolver
member.summary: Gets or sets the contract resolver used by the serializer when serializing .NET objects to JSON and vice versa.

member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConvert
member.summary: Provides methods for converting between .NET types and JSON types.

member.returns: A JSON string representation of the object.

Indicates how the output should be formatted.

member.summary: Serializes the specified object to a JSON string using formatting and .

Indicates how the output should be formatted.
